bug.author: wzhAptiv
bug.description: I see a really strange AI behaviour, that a van tumbles when turning right, because of the too-high speed. Is such behaviour intended since the AI is updated in Version 0.8.0? and I haven't seen it in 0.7.1. See the light-blue van in front of the police car. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37740387/38087781-b9be51ce-3359-11e8-92e7-952869ed2f89.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Yes, I can confirm this is happening in 0.8.0
